overview: Tom Munro is Photobucket Corporation’s Chief Executive Officer. Previously, he was CFO of Onatela and Vallent Corp. Vallent Corp. is a $70 million global software company serving wireless carriers, which was acquired by IBM in 2007. Before Vallent Corp., he served as CFO of Quotesmith.com. While at Quotesmith.com, Mr. Munro guided the company through a successful initial public offering. Mr. Munro spent the early years of his career at R.R. Donnelley & Sons holding various finance positions. As controller of Donnelley Enterprise Solutions he was integral in the companyâ€™s public offering and became the public companyâ€™s CFO soon thereafter. Tom holds an undergraduate degree from Brigham Young University and an M.B.A. from the University of Chicago.
